column4: How do I get 5.1 sound from Rhythmbox or totem? It's working under xine. Seriously, doesn't anyone know this. Must be a standard question, been looking for weeks.
all i know is that there is a setting in totem's preferences
yes, found that one, keeps resetting? Is their not a way to force system wide 5.1? Like on windows :p
not sure. never used 5.1 on linux. sorry. if you dont get response try the forums on ubuntu.com
